thread.title: U.S. Student-Loan Program Losing Money as Borrowers Seek Debt Forgiveness

author: Josh Mitchell
title: U.S. Student-Loan Program Losing Money as Borrowers Seek Debt Forgiveness
text:
WASHINGTON--The U.S. student-loan program is rapidly headed toward becoming a net cost to the federal government, reversing years of projected profits, according to a government report released Friday.

The report, from the Education Department’s inspector general, said the financial squeeze was a result of Americans enrolling in government debt-forgiveness plans.
